title: Iran Is at Work on Missile and Nuclear Sites, Satellite Images Show
summary_full: Repairs at key missile sites began soon after they were hit by Israeli and U.S. strikes last year, but work at Iran’s nuclear facilities has been slower.
summary_public: Repairs at key missile sites began soon after they were hit by Israeli and U.S. strikes last year, but work at Iran’s nuclear facilities has been slower.

IL.label: neutral
IL.evidence: Iran Is at Work on Missile and Nuclear Sites
